com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PaintTool

    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.model  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.base  
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder  

    • Uses of PaintTool in com.defano.jmonet.model

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.model that return PaintTool 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PaintTool PaintToolType.getToolInstance() 

    • Uses of PaintTool in com.defano.jmonet.tools

      Subclasses of PaintTool in com.defano.jmonet.tools 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AirbrushTool
      A tool that paints translucent textured paint on the canvas.
      class  ArrowTool
      A no-op tool; does not modify the canvas in any way.
      class  CurveTool
      A tool for drawing quadratic (Bezier) curves on the canvas.
      class  EraserTool
      Tool that erases pixels from the canvas by turning them back to fully transparent.
      class  FillTool
      Tool that performs a flood-fill of all transparent pixels.
      class  FreeformShapeTool
      Tool allowing user to draw a free-form path (like a paintbrush) that is closed upon completion and can thusly be filled with paint.
      class  LassoTool
      Selection tool allowing the user to draw a free-form selection path on the canvas.
      class  LineTool
      Tool that draws straight lines on the canvas.
      class  MagnifierTool
      Tool that changes the scale factor of the canvas and adjusts the scroll position to re-center the scaled image in the scrollable viewport.
      class  OvalTool
      Tool for drawing outlined or filled ovals/circles on the canvas.
      class  PaintbrushTool
      Tool for drawing free-form, textured paths on the canvas.
      class  PencilTool
      Tool for drawing a single-pixel, black, free-form path on the canvas.
      class  PerspectiveTool
      Tool for making either the left or right side appear closer/further away than the other.
      class  PolygonTool
      Tool to draw outlined or filled irregular polygons on the canvas.
      class  ProjectionTool
      Tools for performing a homography projective of the image.
      class  RectangleTool
      Draws outlined or filled rectangles/squares on the canvas.
      class  RotateTool
      Tool for selecting a bounding box and free-rotating the selected image about its centerpoint.
      class  RoundRectangleTool
      Tool for drawing outlined or filled rounded-rectangles on the canvas.
      class  RubberSheetTool
      Tool for performing a rubber sheet projection of the image.
      class  ScaleTool
      A tool for scaling and resizing the rectangular bounds of an image.
      class  SelectionTool
      A tool for drawing a rectangular selection on the canvas.
      class  ShapeTool
      Tool for drawing regular polygons ("shapes") based on a configurable number of sides.
      class  SlantTool
      Tool for drawing a rectangular selection boundary with drag-handles to shear/slant the image from the top or bottom.
      class  TextTool
      Tool for drawing rasterized text on the canvas.

    • Uses of PaintTool in com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

      Subclasses of PaintTool in com.defano.jmonet.tools.base 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractBoundsTool
      Mouse and keyboard event handler for tools that define a bounding box by clicking and dragging the mouse from the top-left point of the bounds to the bottom-right point.
      class  AbstractLineTool
      Mouse and keyboard handler for tools defining a line drawn between two points.
      class  AbstractPathTool
      Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define a free-form path on the canvas by clicking and dragging.
      class  AbstractPolylineTool
      Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define multiple segments/points along a path.
      class  AbstractSelectionTool
      Mouse and keyboard handler for drawing selections (free-form or bounded) on the canvas.
      class  AbstractTransformTool
      Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define a bounding box with flexible corners that can be dragged into a desired position and shape.
